item.title: Art Stage Singapore will be back in January 2016
item.description: Source: Art Stage Singapore. Art Stage Singapore, the leading art fair in Southeast Asia, will take place from January 21st to 24th, 2016, with a preview day on January 20th. This year’s event aims to showcase a new perspective on contemporary art from the region, highlighting the fair’s role in its development. The sixth edition of Art Stage Singapore draws inspiration from ancient gathering places like the Roman Forum and the Greek Agora, aiming to be a hub for the exchange of both art and ideas.
